nodes.text: No person should have to choose to put themselves at risk from COVID in order to keep food on the table. Workplaces must be safe, and our government must support small businesses in this effort.

@RepValDemings Agreed!! We need our Governors to order mask mandates. Many grocery stores aren’t enforcing local ordinances and here in Florida, our Governor, using the term loosely of course, is too scared to stand up for his constituency. He needs a science class.

@RepValDemings Republican Senators,

How is holding criminal Trump responsible for his destructive and deadly insurrection crimes a "political show"?

Before January 6, 2021 you called it "law and order".

Criminal Trump cannot be above the law. Convict him.

@RepValDemings I am a Congregational Care Pastor and in charge of Children’s Ministry. Am not over 65, but a diabetic with kidney disease. I love what I do, but it’s putting my own health at risk. Any idea when we will be able to be vaccinated and safe to do the jobs we do ?
@RepValDemings Please help those who stay home AND business owners. Thanks for all you do, Ms Demings
@Anewdaw36571218 @RepValDemings @PaSenateDems @PASenateGOP Good Point, thank you.
@bargdaffy @RepValDemings @PaSenateDems @PASenateGOP No problem, if we all die together maybe those who live a little longer can put flowers on our graves. Just something for people to remember
@bargdaffy @RepValDemings @PaSenateDems @PASenateGOP What I look, and what I am is not the same for those I live with. People need to stop saying chill man, been way too long at this point.

@Anewdaw36571218 @RepValDemings @PaSenateDems @PASenateGOP Nah, chill, you look young you will be fine CoVid wise, your problem will be the long term fallout, much like Climate Chaos...sorry, I am a Doomer...
@bargdaffy @RepValDemings @PaSenateDems @PASenateGOP Ahhhh, should I just dig my own hole then?
@RepValDemings More money should have been available to biz that needed not stock brokers and folks who never closed. Know several!!
@RepValDemings Vaccinate grocery workers

@RepValDemings How about a "bold detailed plan" to end this Economic Downturn. According to recent research between February & April, the economy saw a 41% decline in Black business owners & a 32% decline in Hispanic business owners, compared with a 22% overall decline. https://t.co/ciWL4IvbwI

@RepValDemings The simplicity of success & complexity of defeat. Democrats need to have a successful economy headed into the 2022 elections. A simple 10%, $25,000 Consumer Tax Cut with Baby Boomers, as the target guarantees that; "it includes rural whites & minorities. https://t.co/ylbqFTY4be

@RepValDemings The safe road of advocating for workers when it comes to unsafe jobs is badly needed. However presenting a detailed Economic Plan to end this Economic Downturn, black unemployment rate @ 16%, we hear nary a word. Is this a failure of Democratic Leadership? https://t.co/SurS4uW7om

@RepValDemings @GOP can the $1400 stimulus bill for struggling American FAMILIES be passed before the impeachment trial? Dont make the American people suffer any longer. You guys did this to us last year for 9 months.stimulate the economy back into growth.dont loose focus on the American people

@RepValDemings We need congress to get work for the American people.its too early to start failing us over all this arguing over trump. The Republicans already failed us by backing insurrection.Democrats won the senate start acting like it and get to work for us.get us vaccinated. Stimulate us.
@RepValDemings Your account must be broken. It keeps saying you're going to do something but nothing ever happens.

@RozzaKat13 @RepValDemings And dying at an incredible rate, not even to mention the long term effects of having the CoVid-19 such as life long insults to hepatic, renal, cardiac, vascular, neurological, pulmonary, and lymphatic systems.
@bargdaffy @RepValDemings Blah blah blah....

@RepValDemings I suspect most Americans don't realise just how much assistance we in Europe are getting from our Govts. Maybe make them aware that it puts USA at a disadvantage economically and certainly looks as if Rs don't care about the public.
@RepValDemings Including schools!
@Anewdaw36571218 @RepValDemings @PaSenateDems @PASenateGOP No, new laws will dictate you building your own funeral pyre at a discreet location.

@RepValDemings I’m fully expecting to be sick, or, dead by 2021. @PaSenateDems. @PASenateGOP. Will you guys be paying for my funeral, or, hospital stay, becaus I’ve done everything I could do to gain relief I filed for 🤷‍♂️.
